price: A rãnar da suke ganin malã'iku bãbu bushãra a yinin nan ga mãsu laifi kuma sunã cẽwa,"Allah Ya kiyãshe* mu!"
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
footnotes: * Asalin maganar shĩ ne "Tsari tsararre," wãtau muna neman tsari daga Allah, tsari tabbatacce.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma yarawna al-malāikata lā bush'rā yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimīna wayaqūlūna ḥij'ran maḥjūran
